column1: Schuchart was the first to translate ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' (in [[1956]]-[[1957]])
column2: and the third to translate ''[[The Hobbit]]''. He was also the first to translate ''[[Bilbo's Last Song]]'' and ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]''. He wrote a short booklet called ''[[Tolkien: In de Ban van zijn Werk]]''
column5: his visit to The Netherlands in [[1958]] and his involvement with the Dutch translation of ''The Lord of the Rings''.
